name: bipf-native
description: BIPF implemented in Zig as a native module

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node
scripts.test-compat: npm run setup-compat-tests && tape test-compat/*.js | tap-spec
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-extra && npm run test-compat
scripts.start: nodemon -e zig --watch src --exec npm run build --ignore src/zig-cache

author: Andre 'Staltz' Medeiros <contact@staltz.com>
